target_markets.market_size_indicators: algorithmic obituary reading for vendor replacement opportunities

problems_validated.problem: Businesses only switch vendors when old vendor dies
problems_validated.severity: High - creates vendor lock-in and dependency
problems_validated.current_solutions: Waiting for vendor death or manual vendor research
problems_validated.market_gap: No systematic approach to identify vendor switching opportunities

problems_validated.problem: AI wrapper startups lack defensibility against platform steamrollers
problems_validated.severity: High - risk of being flattened by platforms
problems_validated.current_solutions: Building on top of OpenAI, Anthropic APIs
problems_validated.market_gap: Need for customer ownership and proprietary data collection

products_tools.name: Obituary-reading algorithm for vendor replacement
products_tools.use_case: Identifies when vendors die to pitch replacement services

products_tools.name: AI wrapper startups (ChatGPT for lawyers, etc.)
products_tools.use_case: Purpose-built AI solutions for specific verticals
products_tools.sentiment: neutral - described as 'dimes in front of steamroller'

business_strategies.strategy: Buy vendors before they die instead of waiting for obituaries
business_strategies.expected_results: Acquire customer relationships and market position
business_strategies.case_study: Startup that reads obituaries to find vendor replacement opportunities

business_strategies.strategy: Own the customer relationship in wrapper AI businesses
business_strategies.implementation: Use wrapper as entry point to build customer relationships, collect proprietary data, potentially train own models
business_strategies.expected_results: Build defensible moat against platform steamrollers
business_strategies.case_study: Vertical AI wrappers building customer ownership

business_strategies.strategy: Manage on top of commodity platform layer
business_strategies.implementation: Build vertical wrapper that switches between multiple AI models, playing implementation vendors against each other
business_strategies.expected_results: Maintain margins while platforms compete to lowest common denominator
business_strategies.case_study: Cloud platforms where margins eroded by perfect substitution

problems_solutions.problem: AI wrapper startups risk being flattened by platform steamrollers
problems_solutions.solution: Understand strategic situation and build customer ownership

problems_solutions.problem: Rollup strategies fail without customer understanding
problems_solutions.solution: Ensure management understands business at customer level
steps: Don't just buy assets without insight

startup_ideas.idea: Algorithmic vendor death detection and replacement service
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Systematic identification of vendor switching opportunities

startup_ideas.idea: Multi-model AI platform switcher for verticals
startup_ideas.target_market: Businesses needing AI solutions with vendor flexibility
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Vendor lock-in with single AI platforms
startup_ideas.business_model: Platform fees while managing multiple AI providers

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Building wrapper AI startups without understanding steamroller dynamics
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Getting flattened by platforms when they expand
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Understand you're picking up dimes - build customer ownership and exit strategy
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Naive wrapper startups that don't build defensible moats

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Buying vendors/customers without understanding the business
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Rollup strategies fail without customer insight
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Ensure management understands business at customer level
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Rollup strategies that depend on customer understanding

trends_signals.trend: AI founders are older, more sophisticated, and skeptical of previous tech waves
trends_signals.opportunity: Different approach to AI governance and company building

trends_signals.trend: Platform war emerging in AI space
trends_signals.opportunity: First real platform war in tech in a while - steamroller dynamics returning
